group_1.textRight: ...it's not possible to recognize Kureha's candidacy.

group_1.textLeft: No, not like this...!
You can't just tell us to stop now...

group_1.textRight: The way to respond to you has been discussed many@times among the teachers.
Admitting Kureha's candidacy like this will threaten@the fairness of elections.

group_1.textLeft: It will be fine, Kirari.
May I bother you, sir?
One of our school regulations states that...
"By collecting the signatures from at least one-fifth@of enrolled students in both the middle school and@high school divisions..."
"...one can submit a bill of revising school@regulations to the student council."
"In case the bill is, approved by a majority of the@student council members..."
"...the school shall examine the cause."

group_1.textRight: ...collecting signatures in this short period of time@before the election...
...and revising the school regulation will allow your@candidacy to be recognized?

group_1.textLeft: ...So, if I could collect the signatures despite such a@short amount of time...
And then the bill is passed by the student council...
Yet, if such a case happens...
Will the school recognize my candidacy?

group_1.textRight: If such a thing ever happens...
I'll have to call a special faculty meeting...
But collecting the signatures is never easy in the@first place.

group_1.textLeft: That was later than I expected.
I have been waiting for the school to tell us such.
We have a chance of winning.
Merely with the current situation that the number@of my supporters has grown too large to ignore...
We were able to make such a hard negotiation about@deciding an important issue within a short period of@time.
What is it this time?
Huh?@Teacher...
If I remember right, the lacrosse club's...
What is your business...

group_1.textRight: I heard that you've been participating in Kureha's@campaign.
...So this is, what you really wanted to do, huh?

group_1.textLeft: That's right.

group_1.textRight: An election campaign while you couldn't get serious@with lacrosse...
If it's a job done by you, isn't it going to end up@half-baked again?

group_1.textLeft: No it's...
Sir, may I have a moment of your time?
Kirari, would you wait outside?
Kirari briefly told me, about the lacrosse club before.
You will consider her resignment whenever she@shows her seriousness right?
If so, please keep your eyes on her participating in@the campaign.
*Chuckle* You will see in a moment.
Yuna!@[chara:102201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102201:cheek_0][chara:102201:motion_300][chara:102201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:102201:lipSynch_1]...And teacher.
Huh?@Uh, yeah...
What were you talking about with the teacher?

group_1.textRight: That teacher, once told you to show your@seriousness right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...@Only then he'll consider my resignment...

group_1.textRight: If so, you will only have to follow me as you@always do.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: You already found something to get passionate@about.
